entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
